problem_names:
lemma DDH_bound1: "\<bar>spmf (ddh.DDH0 \<G> \<A>) True - spmf (ddh.DDH1 \<G> \<A>) True\<bar> 
                        \<le> \<bar>spmf (ddh.ddh_0 \<G> \<A>) True - spmf (ddh.ddh_1 \<G> \<A>) True\<bar> 
                              + \<bar>spmf (ddh.ddh_1 \<G> \<A>) True - spmf (ddh.DDH1 \<G> \<A>) True\<bar>"

lemma DDH_bound2: 
  shows "\<bar>spmf (ddh.DDH0 \<G> \<A>) True - spmf (ddh.DDH1 \<G> \<A>) True\<bar> 
               \<le> ddh.advantage \<G> \<A> + \<bar>spmf (ddh.ddh_1 \<G> \<A>) True - spmf (ddh.DDH1 \<G> \<A>) True\<bar>"

lemma rewrite: 
  shows "(sample_uniform (order \<G>) \<bind> (\<lambda>x. sample_uniform (order \<G>) 
            \<bind> (\<lambda>y. sample_uniform (order \<G>) \<bind> (\<lambda>z. \<A> (\<^bold>g [^] x) (\<^bold>g [^] y) (\<^bold>g [^] z \<otimes> \<^bold>g))))) 
              = (sample_uniform (order \<G>) \<bind> (\<lambda>x. sample_uniform (order \<G>) 
                \<bind> (\<lambda>y. sample_uniform (order \<G>) \<bind> (\<lambda>z. \<A> (\<^bold>g [^] x) (\<^bold>g [^] y) (\<^bold>g [^] z)))))"
(is "?lhs = ?rhs")
translations: lemma DDH0_eq_ddh_0: "ddh.DDH0 \<G> \<A> = ddh.ddh_0 \<G> \<A>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. DDH0 \<A> = ddh_0 \<A>
by(simp add: ddh.DDH0_def Let_def monoid.nat_pow_pow ddh.ddh_0_def)

lemma DDH_bound1: "\<bar>spmf (ddh.DDH0 \<G> \<A>) True - spmf (ddh.DDH1 \<G> \<A>) True\<bar> 
                        \<le> \<bar>spmf (ddh.ddh_0 \<G> \<A>) True - spmf (ddh.ddh_1 \<G> \<A>) True\<bar> 
                              + \<bar>spmf (ddh.ddh_1 \<G> \<A>) True - spmf (ddh.DDH1 \<G> \<A>) True\<bar>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<bar>spmf (DDH0 \<A>) True - spmf (DDH1 \<A>) True\<bar>
    \<le> \<bar>spmf (ddh_0 \<A>) True - spmf (ddh_1 \<A>) True\<bar> +
          \<bar>spmf (ddh_1 \<A>) True - spmf (DDH1 \<A>) True\<bar>
by (simp add: abs_diff_triangle_ineq2 DDH0_eq_ddh_0)

lemma DDH_bound2: 
  shows "\<bar>spmf (ddh.DDH0 \<G> \<A>) True - spmf (ddh.DDH1 \<G> \<A>) True\<bar> 
               \<le> ddh.advantage \<G> \<A> + \<bar>spmf (ddh.ddh_1 \<G> \<A>) True - spmf (ddh.DDH1 \<G> \<A>) True\<bar>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<bar>spmf (DDH0 \<A>) True - spmf (DDH1 \<A>) True\<bar>
    \<le> advantage \<A> +
          \<bar>spmf (ddh_1 \<A>) True - spmf (DDH1 \<A>) True\<bar>
using advantage_def DDH_bound1

proof (prove)
using this:
  advantage ?\<A> =
  \<bar>spmf (ddh_0 ?\<A>) True - spmf (ddh_1 ?\<A>) True\<bar>
  \<bar>spmf (DDH0 ?\<A>) True - spmf (DDH1 ?\<A>) True\<bar>
  \<le> \<bar>spmf (ddh_0 ?\<A>) True - spmf (ddh_1 ?\<A>) True\<bar> +
        \<bar>spmf (ddh_1 ?\<A>) True - spmf (DDH1 ?\<A>) True\<bar>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<bar>spmf (DDH0 \<A>) True - spmf (DDH1 \<A>) True\<bar>
    \<le> advantage \<A> +
          \<bar>spmf (ddh_1 \<A>) True - spmf (DDH1 \<A>) True\<bar>
by simp

lemma rewrite:

lemma DDH_\<A>'_bound: "ddh.advantage \<G> (ddh.DDH_\<A>' \<G> \<A>) = \<bar>spmf (ddh.ddh_1 \<G> \<A>) True - spmf (ddh.DDH1 \<G> \<A>) True\<bar>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. advantage (DDH_\<A>' \<A>) =
    \<bar>spmf (ddh_1 \<A>) True - spmf (DDH1 \<A>) True\<bar>
unfolding ddh.advantage_def ddh.ddh_1_def ddh.DDH1_def Let_def ddh.DDH_\<A>'_def ddh.ddh_0_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<bar>spmf
           (sample_uniform (order \<G>) \<bind>
            (\<lambda>x.
                sample_uniform (order \<G>) \<bind>
                (\<lambda>y.
                    \<A> (\<^bold>g [^] x) (\<^bold>g [^] y)
                     (\<^bold>g [^] (x * y) \<otimes> \<^bold>g))))
           True -
          spmf
           (sample_uniform (order \<G>) \<bind>
            (\<lambda>x.
                sample_uniform (order \<G>) \<bind>
                (\<lambda>y.
                    sample_uniform (order \<G>) \<bind>
                    (\<lambda>z.
                        \<A> (\<^bold>g [^] x) (\<^bold>g [^] y)
                         (\<^bold>g [^] z \<otimes> \<^bold>g)))))
           True\<bar> =
    \<bar>spmf
           (sample_uniform (order \<G>) \<bind>
            (\<lambda>x.
                sample_uniform (order \<G>) \<bind>
                (\<lambda>y.
                    sample_uniform (order \<G>) \<bind>
                    (\<lambda>z.
                        \<A> (\<^bold>g [^] x) (\<^bold>g [^] y)
                         (\<^bold>g [^] z)))))
           True -
          spmf
           (sample_uniform (order \<G>) \<bind>
            (\<lambda>s.
                sample_uniform (order \<G>) \<bind>
                (\<lambda>r.
                    \<A> (\<^bold>g [^] s) (\<^bold>g [^] r)
                     ((\<^bold>g [^] s) [^] r \<otimes> \<^bold>g))))
           True\<bar>
by (simp add: rewrite abs_minus_commute nat_pow_pow)
lemma DDH_advantage_bound: "ddh.DDH_advantage \<G> \<A> \<le> ddh.advantage \<G> \<A> + ddh.advantage \<G> (ddh.DDH_\<A>' \<G> \<A>)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. DDH_advantage \<A> \<le> advantage \<A> + advantage (DDH_\<A>' \<A>)
using DDH_bound2 DDH_\<A>'_bound DDH_advantage_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<bar>spmf (DDH0 ?\<A>) True - spmf (DDH1 ?\<A>) True\<bar>
  \<le> advantage ?\<A> +
        \<bar>spmf (ddh_1 ?\<A>) True - spmf (DDH1 ?\<A>) True\<bar>
  advantage (DDH_\<A>' ?\<A>) =
  \<bar>spmf (ddh_1 ?\<A>) True - spmf (DDH1 ?\<A>) True\<bar>
  DDH_advantage ?\<A> =
  \<bar>spmf (DDH0 ?\<A>) True - spmf (DDH1 ?\<A>) True\<bar>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. DDH_advantage \<A> \<le> advantage \<A> + advantage (DDH_\<A>' \<A>)
by simp
end
end
